column20: Charged Attack: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.
column21: Plunging Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
column22: Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact. If this Plunging Attack is triggered by Chihayaburu, it will be converted to Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan.
column168: Press: #Unleashes a secret technique as fierce as the rushing wind that pulls objects and opponents towards Kazuha's current position before launching opponents within the AoE, dealing Anemo DMG and lifting Kazuha into the air on a rushing gust of wind. Within 10s of remaining airborne after casting Chihayaburu, Kazuha can unleash a powerful Plunging Attack known as Midare Ranzan.
column169: Hold: Can be used in mid-air.
column170: Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan: Charges up before unleashing greater Anemo DMG over a larger AoE than Press Mode.
column332: Soumon Swordsmanship: If Chihayaburu comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro when cast, Chihayaburu will absorb that element and if Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan is used before the effect expires, it will deal an additional 200% ATK of the absorbed elemental type as DMG. This will be considered Plunging Attack DMG. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use of Chihayaburu.
column333: Poetics of Fuubutsu: Upon triggering a Swirl reaction, Kaedehara Kazuha will grant all party members a 0.04% Elemental DMG Bonus to the element absorbed by Swirl for every point of Elemental Mastery he has for 8s. Bonuses for different elements obtained through this method can co-exist.
column334: Scarlet Hills: Decreases Chihayaburu's CD by 10%. Using Kazuha Slash resets the CD of Chihayaburu.
column335: Yamaarashi Tailwind: The Autumn Whirlwind field created by Kazuha Slash has the following effects: • Increases Kaedehara Kazuha's own Elemental Mastery by 200. • Increases the Elemental Mastery of characters within the field by 200. The Elemental Mastery-increasing effects of this Constellation do not stack.
column336: Maple Monogatari: Increases the Level of Chihayaburu by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column337: Oozora Genpou: #When Kaedehara Kazuha's Energy is lower than 45, he obtains the following effects: • {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tapping}{LAYOUT_PC#Pressing}{LAYOUT_PS#Pressing} or Holding Chihayaburu regenerates 3 or 4 Energy for Kaedehara Kazuha, respectively. • When gliding, Kaedehara Kazuha regenerates 2 Energy per second.
column338: Wisdom of Bansei: Increases the Level of Kazuha Slash by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column339: Crimson Momiji: After using Chihayaburu or Kazuha Slash, Kaedehara Kazuha gains an Anemo Infusion for 5s. Additionally, each point of Elemental Mastery will increase the DMG dealt by Kaedehara Kazuha's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack by 0.2%.
